title: Dune Reference with Kled
body:
When Kled says "Noxus was created to train the faithful" is that at reference to Frank Herberts "Dune" where they say that "God created Arrakis to train the faithful". I looked around online and I couldn't seem to find anything.
Thanks

replies.body:
Yep. 

I am WAAARGHbobo.  And I love Dune (the first book only)
